subject: Pain-Relieving Drugs
Baseball
Football
Sports Medicine
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The anti-inflammatory drug Toradol has in recent years become a go-to elixir for baseball and football players, but little is known about the lasting implications, if any, for athletes.
snippet: The anti-inflammatory drug Toradol has in recent years become a go-to elixir for baseball and football players, but little is known about the lasting implications, if any, for athletes.
